On my website I have the following meta tag : The following HTML :
And the following css : .inner{width:1060px;} @media screen and (max-width:640px){ .inner{width:100%;} } My problem : on Ipad, the width of the page is blocked at 768px while my site is 1060px wide. I would like the website to fit the width of the iPad, but I need to keep a 100% with on iPhone. Can you help me please ? Thank you in advance !
